meanings.definition: The final resolution or clarification of a dramatic or narrative plot.
meanings.sent1: The denouements in the story revealed the true identity of the mysterious character.
meanings.sent2: The denouements of the play left the audience feeling satisfied with the ending.
meanings.sent3: The denouements of the movie were unexpected but made perfect sense in the end.
meanings.sent4: The denouements of the novel untangled all the mysteries and secrets woven throughout.
meanings.sent5: The denouements of the story were like pieces of a puzzle finally fitting together.

meanings.definition: The outcome or result of a complex series of events.
meanings.sent1: The denouements of the experiment surprised the researchers with unexpected findings.
meanings.sent2: The denouements of the investigation led to the discovery of the missing artifact.
meanings.sent3: The denouements of the game were in favor of the underdog team, much to everyone's shock.
meanings.sent4: The denouements of the negotiations finally brought peace to the warring factions.
meanings.sent5: The denouements of the project determined its success or failure in the end.

meanings.definition: The unraveling or untying of a complicated situation.
meanings.sent1: The denouements of the conflict exposed the truth behind all the misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: The denouements of the mystery slowly revealed the identity of the mastermind.
meanings.sent3: The denouements of the puzzle game challenged players to think outside the box.
meanings.sent4: The denouements of the court case brought justice to the wronged party.
meanings.sent5: The denouements of the problem-solving task required careful analysis and deduction.
